Comment: I think you misunderstood me. I think Biden bowing out late was the plan. I told my friends I thought that would be the strategy back as far as 2023- wait until the last possible moment to bait and switch the candidate so that 1. The democrats would have no choice but to rally behind a single, obvious candidate without any infighting, and 2. Waste republican's campaign efforts on attacking Biden instead of Harris.  That only would have worked if Biden could have held it together enough to be an actual, viable candidate. Then he could get sick or have a family crisis and decide to honorably bow out. But combined with his complete meltdown in the debate and Trump's assassination attempt, the strategy fell apart.
